translations: n.穆穆袍（夏威夷妇女宽大长袍）

sentences.sentence: Aloha Friday, where people go to work in aloha shirts and muumuus, is going to be Furlough Friday, where they stay home in pajamas and look for jobs on the Internet.
sentences.translation: 欢迎的星期五，在这里人们都穿着夏威夷衬衫和穆穆袍去工作，现在却将成为休假的星期五，他们呆在家里，穿着睡衣裤，在网上寻找着工作。
